scripts.build-python: npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i spec.yml -g python -o build/python/${npm_package_name} --additional-properties="packageVersion=${npm_package_version},packageName=${npm_package_name},projectName=${npm_package_name}" && tar -czf build/${npm_package_name}-python-${npm_package_version}.tgz -C build/python/${npm_package_name} .
